story_stone_04_02000/2401_1201_0100_10: So, it didn’t go well with Palkia...I mean, Cyrus?
story_stone_04_02000/2401_1201_0300_10:
“I see no benefit or reason to extend my help
to you.”
story_stone_04_02000/2401_1201_0500_10:
Well, no matter how much time we spend talking
to him, it won’t get us anywhere.
story_stone_04_02000/2401_1201_0600_10:
I’m sorry that you had to come all this way,
N and Iris.
story_stone_04_02000/2401_1201_0700_10:
No, it’s fine. I actually wanted to take some time
to have a chat with Dialga and Giratina.
story_stone_04_02000/2401_1201_0900_10: Now, Dialga, Giratina... Let me hear your voices.
story_stone_04_02000/2401_1201_1200_10:
Apparently, they’re not sure if the stones have any
connection to Arceus...
story_stone_04_02000/2401_1201_1300_10:
Both Dialga and Giratina seem troubled...or rather,
confused, I think.
story_stone_04_02000/2401_1201_1400_10:
Yeah, Giratina, in particular, refuses to talk
about Arceus...
story_stone_04_02000/2401_1201_1600_10:
The creator of all things really is a massive
presence, huh...
story_stone_04_02000/2401_1201_1700_10: But these two are also saying...
story_stone_04_02000/2401_1201_1800_10: Arceus’s presence is getting stronger by the day.
